messages.subject: Withheld Package(s)
messages.body:
Dear Sir/Ma,


I am Mr. Richard Mullen the Assistant Director, Inspection Unit in Heathrow
Airport,London.During my recent withheld package routine check at the Airport
Storage Vault,I discovered an abandoned shipment from a Diplomat and when
scanned, it revealed an undisclosed sum of money in two Metal Trunk Boxes
weighing approximately 25kg each.The consignment was abandoned because the
Contents of the consignment was not properly declared by the consignee as
"MONEY" rather it was declared as personal effect to avoid interogation and
also the inability of the diplomat to pay for the London Non Inspection
charges.Each of the boxes will contain more than $1 Million to $1.5 Million and
the consignment is still left in our Storage House here at the Heathrow
Airport,London till date.The details of the consignment including your EMAIL
ADDRESS,NAME and an ENVELOP contains PAPERWORK tagged on the Metal Trunk boxes.


However, to enable me confirm  that you are the actual recipient of this
consignment as the assistant director of the Inspection Unit, I will advise you
reconfirm the following information:


Your Full Name
Your Full Address
Your Contact Phone/Mobile Phone Number


to enable me cross check if it corresponds with the address on the official
documents. Please note that this consignment is supposed to have been returned
to the London Treasury Department as unclaimed delivery due to the delays in
concluding the clearance processes so as a result of this, I will not be able
to receive your details on my official email account. So in order words to
enable me cross check your details,I will advise you send the required details
to my private email address" richard_mulllen@yahoo.com.my " for quick
processing and response.Once I receive your details, I can get everything
concluded within 2 -3 working days upon your acceptance and proceed to your
address for delivery with the assistance of a diplomat.


Lastly, be informed that the reason I have taken it upon myself to contact you
personally about this abandoned consignment is because I want us to transact
this business and I will get some money since the consignment has not yet been
returned to the London Treasury Department after being abandoned by the
diplomat so immediately the confirmation is made, I will pay for the London Non
Inspection Fee and arrange for the boxes to be delivered to your doorstep after
all arrangements have been perfected.I will like to have a COMPERSATION of 10%
of the total money for my effort .I need your assurance before I proceed
futher.


I am still on inspection for the week, just email me and make sure you include
your mobile number so that I can give you a call. Reply to my email address for
further information in details.


I wait to hear from you urgently if you are still alive
Yours Faithfully,
Mr. Richard Mullen
Heathrow Airport,London-United Kingdom
messages.raw:
Richard Mullen

From: richard3mullen@yahoo.com.my
Subject: Withheld Package(s)
Date: Fri, 8 Jun 2012

Dear Sir/Ma,

I am Mr. Richard Mullen the Assistant Director, Inspection Unit in Heathrow Airport,London.During my recent withheld package routine check at the Airport Storage Vault,I discovered an abandoned shipment from a Diplomat and when scanned, it revealed an undisclosed sum of money in two Metal Trunk Boxes weighing approximately 25kg each.The consignment was abandoned because the Contents of the consignment was not properly declared by the consignee as "MONEY" rather it was declared as personal effect to avoid interogation and also the inability of the diplomat to pay for the London Non Inspection charges.Each of the boxes will contain more than $1 Million to $1.5 Million and the consignment is still left in our Storage House here at the Heathrow Airport,London till date.The details of the consignment including your EMAIL ADDRESS,NAME and an ENVELOP contains PAPERWORK tagged on the Metal Trunk boxes.

However, to enable me confirm that you are the actual recipient of this consignment as the assistant director of the Inspection Unit, I will advise you reconfirm the following information:

Your Full Name
Your Full Address
Your Contact Phone/Mobile Phone Number

to enable me cross check if it corresponds with the address on the official documents. Please note that this consignment is supposed to have been returned to the London Treasury Department as unclaimed delivery due to the delays in concluding the clearance processes so as a result of this, I will not be able to receive your details on my official email account. So in order words to enable me cross check your details,I will advise you send the required details to my private email address" richard_mulllen@yahoo.com.my " for quick processing and response.Once I receive your details, I can get everything concluded within 2 -3 working days upon your acceptance and proceed to your address for delivery with the assistance of a diplomat.

Lastly, be informed that the reason I have taken it upon myself to contact you personally about this abandoned consignment is because I want us to transact this business and I will get some money since the consignment has not yet been returned to the London Treasury Department after being abandoned by the diplomat so immediately the confirmation is made, I will pay for the London Non Inspection Fee and arrange for the boxes to be delivered to your doorstep after all arrangements have been perfected.I will like to have a COMPERSATION of 10% of the total money for my effort .I need your assurance before I proceed futher.

I am still on inspection for the week, just email me and make sure you include your mobile number so that I can give you a call. Reply to my email address for further information in details.

I wait to hear from you urgently if you are still alive
Yours Faithfully,
Mr. Richard Mullen
Heathrow Airport,London-United Kingdom

It's been a while since we've seen a mention of the classic "two Metal Trunk Boxes"!

messages.subject: To Mr Mullen
messages.body:
Dear Mr Mullen


I am due to fly back to London via Heathrow shortly on the way back from The
2012 Gusset and Jockstrap convention in Florida .. can we make an appointment
to discuss these modalities then? I can see things are urgent.


Tossov


Sir Lonslo Tossov
Human Resources Director
The Court of St James,
Broadmoor 
London 
FU2 GIT 
Mobile 07781 xxxxxx
messages.raw:
Lonslo Tossov

To: richard1mullen@yahoo.com.my; richard1mullen@yahoo.com
Sent: Monday, 11 June 2012
Subject: To Mr Mullen

Dear Mr Mullen

I am due to fly back to London via Heathrow shortly on the way back from The 2012 Gusset and Jockstrap convention in Florida .. can we make an appointment to discuss these modalities then? I can see things are urgent.

Tossov

Sir Lonslo Tossov
Human Resources Director
The Court of St James,
Broadmoor
London
FU2 GIT
Mobile 07781 xxxxxx

messages.body:
Dear Sir Lonslo Tossov,


Thanks for your prompt response.I must tell you that this transactions requires
urgent attention to enable us actualise it.When are you coming  back to London?
I needed to start processing all document and other arrangements in your name
as the beneficiary.This will also cost some money as you know.I will like us to
complete this transaction as urgent as possible, therefore send me your direct
contact phone numnber in the USA.


I will give you more information as soon as I hear from you.


I awaits your urgent response.


Sincerely,
Richard Mulen
messages.raw:
Richard Mullen

Date: Tue, 12 Jun 2012
From: richard1mullen@yahoo.com.my

Dear Sir Lonslo Tossov,

Thanks for your prompt response.I must tell you that this transactions requires urgent attention to enable us actualise it.When are you coming back to London? I needed to start processing all document and other arrangements in your name as the beneficiary.This will also cost some money as you know.I will like us to complete this transaction as urgent as possible, therefore send me your direct contact phone numnber in the USA.

I will give you more information as soon as I hear from you.

I awaits your urgent response.

Sincerely,
Richard Mulen

messages.subject: To Mr Mullen
messages.body:
Dear Mr Mullen I hope to leave after my last speech tomorrow probably Friday or
even the same day. You can reach me on xxxxxxxxx. If I am not by the phone
then ask for my PA Harry Kwims. I do hope we can get things sorted this sounds
too good a chance to pass up.  Lonslo


Sir Lonslo Tossov
Human Resources Director
The Court of St James,
Broadmoor 
London 
FU2 GIT 
Mobile 07781 xxxxxx

Sincerely,Richard Mullen

messages.subject: To Mr Mullen
messages.body:
Dear Mr Mullen 
Yes I am back in London now, are you able to give me a call? I
can get to Heathrow if needs be if HRH is not using the Limo.


 If I am not
around, then leave a message for me with my personal assistant Irma Wanquer.


regards  
Tossov

If I am not around, then leave a message for me with my personal assistant Irma Wanquer.

regards

messages.body:
Dear Tossov,


 I am in receipt of your email, the cost of completing the Non inspection fee will cost you the sum of 2100 pounds only so that I will get your consignment clear from the UK customs.


I awaist your urgent response.


Sincerely,
Richard
messages.raw:
Richard Mullen

Finally, a hard figure!

I am in receipt of your email, the cost of completing the Non inspection fee will cost you the sum of 2100 pounds only so that I will get your consignment clear from the UK customs.

I awaist your urgent response.

Sincerely,
Richard

messages.body:
July 5


Dear Mr Mullen


That seems a lot but in the greater scheme of things not so daunting; I may be able to raid the petty cash and get something off to you. Where are you in the UK? I can get my PA Ilichy Miracksy to drop over a cheque. 


Tossov


Sir Lonslo Tossov
Human Resources Director
The Court of St James,
Broadmoor 
London 
FU2 GIT 
44 (0)906 635 8502

messages.subject: Attn:Sir Lonslo Tossov /Treat as urgent as posisble.
messages.body:
Attn:Sir Lonslo Tossov,


I am pleased to inform you that I have successfully dispatch your consignments to Netherland for security and prompt claim purpose.I am presently on official assignment in the USA. This is due to the high rate of tax and government regulations on income in London,it's for your own good.


You are advised to start preparing all arrangements to travel to Netherland for the claim of your consignments.


As soon as I hear from you,I will give you further information for this claim.Send me your your direct phone number to enable me call you for furthjer information in details.


I awaits your urgent response.


Yours Faithfully,
Mr. Richard Mullen
Heathrow Airport,London-United Kingdom
messages.raw:
Richard Mullen

Date: Wed, 15 Aug 2012
From: richard1mullen@yahoo.com.my
Subject: Attn:Sir Lonslo Tossov /Treat as urgent as posisble.

Attn:Sir Lonslo Tossov,

I am pleased to inform you that I have successfully dispatch your consignments to Netherland for security and prompt claim purpose.I am presently on official assignment in the USA. This is due to the high rate of tax and government regulations on income in London,it's for your own good.

You are advised to start preparing all arrangements to travel to Netherland for the claim of your consignments.

As soon as I hear from you,I will give you further information for this claim.Send me your your direct phone number to enable me call you for furthjer information in details.

I awaits your urgent response.

Yours Faithfully,
Mr. Richard Mullen
Heathrow Airport,London-United Kingdom

messages.body:
August 21, 2012


	Dear Mr Mullen


Sorry for the delay, the Olympics have been first priority here as you might imagine. However we paid off the last of the native help a day or so ago, with just a few spoons and shower curtains missing from the Athlete's Village, too. No doubt gone south, with some third world johnnies. But to get back to these modalities: I am confused, I thought I was expected to claim the consignment from the UK? Is the financial saving really that much? I have my assistant on standby in readiness for this and we are eager to get going. If he uses his moped he can cut through the traffic and get to Heathrow in a few hours. Kindly reply quickly, as I know you chaps can be a bit slow in organising things. 


TOSSOV

Lonslo Tossov

TOSSOV

messages.subject: Attn:Sir Lonslo Tossov
messages.body:
Attn:Sir Lonslo Tossov,
Human Resources Director,The Court of St James,Broadmoor London


I have tried to reach you without response, your phone is not connecting and I decided to send you an email in regards to your long awaiting fund. Be informed that every arrangements have been perfected for you to claim your consignment in the Netherlands.
 Your present will be needed for the signing of the release paperwork and claim of your consignment. As soon as I hear from you, I will give you more information in details.
messages.raw:
Richard Mullen

... nothing for over a year, and then ...

Date: Wed, 14 Aug 2013
From: richard1mullen@yahoo.com.my
Subject: Attn:Sir Lonslo Tossov

Attn:Sir Lonslo Tossov,
Human Resources Director,The Court of St James,Broadmoor London

I have tried to reach you without response, your phone is not connecting and I decided to send you an email in regards to your long awaiting fund. Be informed that every arrangements have been perfected for you to claim your consignment in the Netherlands. Your present will be needed for the signing of the release paperwork and claim of your consignment. As soon as I hear from you, I will give you more information in details.

messages.body:
Dear Mr Mullen


This delay is very irksome. Are you serious or not?


It has been over a month since we last heard from you. Actually a year! If we can arrange and delivery a royal baby in that time I would have thought sorting out some trifling paperwork details your end would have been a doddle. 


Be that as it may, I have now got new phone number and look forward to hearing from you. As before you can ask for Irma Wanquer if I am not around. She will be on holiday shortly and so if you miss her then her temporary replacement will be Yusa Pillok.


Kind expedite matters from now on in as I am off shortly to attend the Commonwealth Conference on Indigent Finance Personnel.


Why do I have to despatch staff to Amsterdam by the way? I thought the consignment was in London??


TOSSOV


Sir Lonslo Tossov
Human Resources Director
The Court of St James,
Broadmoor 
London 
FU2 GIT 
Phone/Fax: 44 (0)906  517 4050
messages.raw:
Lonslo Tossov

Sent: Wednesday, 14 August 2013

Dear Mr Mullen

This delay is very irksome. Are you serious or not?

It has been over a month since we last heard from you. Actually a year! If we can arrange and delivery a royal baby in that time I would have thought sorting out some trifling paperwork details your end would have been a doddle.

Be that as it may, I have now got new phone number and look forward to hearing from you. As before you can ask for Irma Wanquer if I am not around. She will be on holiday shortly and so if you miss her then her temporary replacement will be Yusa Pillok.

Kind expedite matters from now on in as I am off shortly to attend the Commonwealth Conference on Indigent Finance Personnel.

Why do I have to despatch staff to Amsterdam by the way? I thought the consignment was in London??

TOSSOV

Sir Lonslo Tossov
Human Resources Director
The Court of St James,
Broadmoor
London
FU2 GIT
Phone/Fax: 44 (0)906 517 4050

messages.body:
Attn:Sir Lonslo Tossov,


I am really surprised that I have not heard from you, to deliver your consignment to London will cost you the sum of $  9,000 Pounds only, the fee must be advance to enable us start processing all paperwork in your name for this claim. If you want to travel to Amsterdam or to dispatch staff to Amsterdam, the start must travel with the money.


As soon as I hear from you, I will give you more information in details. I awaits your urgent response.


Sincerely,
Richard Mullen
messages.raw:
Richard Mullen

Date: Wed, 11 Sep 2013

Attn:Sir Lonslo Tossov,

I am really surprised that I have not heard from you, to deliver your consignment to London will cost you the sum of $ 9,000 Pounds only, the fee must be advance to enable us start processing all paperwork in your name for this claim. If you want to travel to Amsterdam or to dispatch staff to Amsterdam, the start must travel with the money.

As soon as I hear from you, I will give you more information in details. I awaits your urgent response.

Sincerely,
Richard Mullen

messages.body:
Sept 11


Dear Mr Mullen


It has been so long since I have heard back from you that I thought something was amiss.


I am confused somewhat. If you are based at London Heathrow , where you first said the trunk boxes were in the airport storage vault, then why will we have to pay to have the consignment delivered from Amsterdam? Am I missing something? Why have the items been transferred out of the country?


Let me know btw the way if you and your wife or doxy would like a room in Broadmoor as we have some accomodation here available on an invitation-only basis. Perhaps when the items finally arrive and these little hic-cups are settled, a little celebration party might be in order. My hospitality manager there, Mr Peter Sutcliffe, will give you the reception you deserve. He may be a Yorkshire man but knows how to throw a ripping time.


TOSSOV





 




scamorama main street 
* 
get booked 
*

I am confused somewhat. If you are based at London Heathrow , where you first said the trunk boxes were in the airport storage vault, then why will we have to pay to have the consignment delivered from Amsterdam? Am I missing something? Why have the items been transferred out of the country?

Let me know btw the way if you and your wife or doxy would like a room in Broadmoor as we have some accomodation here available on an invitation-only basis. Perhaps when the items finally arrive and these little hic-cups are settled, a little celebration party might be in order. My hospitality manager there, Mr Peter Sutcliffe, will give you the reception you deserve. He may be a Yorkshire man but knows how to throw a ripping time.

TOSSOV

more to come?
